name: Music_3160.wav
keywords: ['r&b', 'soul', 'remix', 'male vocal', 'high-pitched singing', 'autotune', 'electric guitar sample', 'electronic percussion', 'heavy effects', 'dreamy', 'trippy']
caption: This is a remix of an R&B music piece. An auto-tuned male vocal is singing melodically in a minor scale at a high pitch. A fading electric guitar sample can be heard in the distance. Repeated hits of low-frequency percussion add a deepening effect to the piece. The atmosphere is very dreamy and very trippy. This piece could be used in a dream sequence at a movie or a TV show.
